words.definition: With a comparative or with more and a verb phrase, establishes a correlation with one or more other such comparatives.
examples: It looks weaker and weaker, the more I think about it.
I'm much the wiser for having had a difficult time like that.

words.definition: Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
examples: Please push the door to.

words.definition: In rhythm, the second half of a divided beat.
Expressing distance or motion.
The name of the Latin script letter A/a.
A position of power or influence, or a way to get it.
examples: His parents got him an in with the company.

words.definition: The name of the Latin-script letter I.
examples: the position of an i-dot (the dot of an i)

words.definition: Something being indicated that is there; one of those.
To address (a person) using the pronoun you (in the past, especially to use you rather than thou, when you was considered more formal).
One who is neither a he nor a she; a creature; a dehumanized being.
examples: In the next game, Adam and Tom will be it…

words.definition: To switch on
examples: Can you on the light?

words.definition: Something being indicated that is here; one of these.
To such an extent or degree; to the same extent or degree.
examples: It's not as well made, but it's twice as expensive.
1865, The Act of Suicide as Distinct from the Crime of Self-Murder: A Sermon

words.definition: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.
A wealthy or privileged person.
To reply to or talk to someone, either online or face-to-face. (from the practice of targeting a message or reply to someone online by writing @name)
examples: Cars 2 is the most influential film of all time. Don't @ me.

words.definition: The game of tag, or it, in which the player attempting to catch the others is called "he".
A unary operation on logical values that changes true to false, and false to true.

A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
An instance or example of using the word "but".
examples: It has to be done – no ifs or buts.

words.definition: Used to indicate source or provenance.
examples: I got a letter from my brother.
This manuscript is from the 1980s.

words.definition: Used to express surprise, shock or amazement.
examples: My, what big teeth you have!

words.definition: Connects at least two alternative words, phrases, clauses, sentences, etc. each of which could make a passage true. In English, this is the "inclusive or." The "exclusive or" is formed by "either [...] or".
examples: He might get cancer, or be hit by a bus, or God knows what.

words.definition: (personal) The speakers/writers, or the speaker/writer and at least one other person (not the person being addressed). (This is the exclusive we.)
One
(with a possessive pronoun) Everything that one is capable of.
examples: She gave her all, and collapsed at the finish line.

words.definition: True, accurate.
examples: That is so.  You are responsible for this, is that not so?

words.definition: Honorific alternative letter-case form of his, sometimes used when referring to God or another important figure who is understood from context.
(the third-person plural) A group of people, animals, plants or objects previously mentioned.
examples: Dogs may bark if they want to be fed.
They requested a seat at Friday's performance but didn't say if they preferred the balcony or the floor.

words.definition: As the direct object of a verb.
examples: Can you hear me?

words.definition: An uncertainty, possibility, condition, doubt etc.
The digit or figure 1.
(auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
examples: She can speak English, French, and German.   I can play football.   Can you remember your fifth birthday?
You can go outside and play when you're finished with your homework.   Can I use your pen?

words.definition: (now uncommon or literary) To wish, desire (something).
examples: Do what you will.

words.definition: Factually right, correct; factual.
examples: It is a just assessment of the facts.

words.definition: (usually in the plural) Something that a person likes (prefers).
examples: Tell me your likes and dislikes.

words.definition: Moving around; astir.
examples: After my bout with Guillan-Barre Syndrome, it took me 6 months to be up and about again.
This idea has been about for a while but has only recently become fashionable.

words.definition: The direction opposed to the pull of gravity.
examples: Up is a good way to go.
I hate almost everything about my job. The only up is that it's so close to home.

words.definition: A means of exit, escape, reprieve, etc.
examples: They wrote the law to give those organizations an out.

words.definition: (Singlish) Used to contradict an underlying assumption held by the interlocutor.
To possess, own.
examples: I have a house and a car.
Do you have the key? (not necessarily one's own key)

words.definition: The time at which something happens.
examples: A good article will cover the who, the what, the when, the where, the why and the how.

words.definition: To a greater degree or extent.
examples: I could no more climb that than fly!
You're more beautiful than I ever imagined.

words.definition: A party, celebration, social function.
examples: We’re having a bit of a do on Saturday to celebrate my birthday.
Nice do!

words.definition: A negating expression; an answer that shows disagreement or disapproval
examples: The workers voted on whether to strike, and there were thirty "yeses" and two "nos".

words.definition: A person under discussion; a question of which person.
To possess, own.
examples: I have a house and a car.
Do you have the key? (not necessarily one's own key)

words.definition: That place.
examples: You rinse and de-string the green beans; I'll take it from there.

words.definition: A female person or animal.
examples: I think this bird is a him, but it may be a her.

words.definition: (interrogative) What one or ones (of those mentioned or implied).
examples: By now, you must surely know which is which.
Please take which you please.

words.definition: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
examples: Time stops for nobody.   the ebb and flow of time

words.definition: Offspring.

A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
Something that would happen, or would be the case, under different circumstances; a potentiality.
A female.
examples: Pat is definitely a she.

words.definition: Things that are new.
examples: Out with the old, in with the new.

words.definition: Used as plural of person; a body of human beings considered generally or collectively; a group of two or more persons.
examples: There were so many people at the restaurant last night.

words.definition: The means by which something is accomplished.
examples: I am not interested in the why, but in the how.

words.definition: Something that must not be done (usually in the phrase dos and don'ts).
Of a measurement: approximately, roughly.
examples: I guess he must have weighed some 90 kilos.

words.definition: (focus) In addition; besides; as well; further; too.
examples: They had porridge for breakfast, and also toast.

words.definition: (plural) Those ones.
The present time.
examples: Now is the right time.
She is living in the now.

words.definition: An other, another (person, etc), more often rendered as another.
examples: I'm afraid little Robbie does not always play well with others.
One boat is not better than the other.

words.definition: One who is neither a he nor a she; a creature; a dehumanized being.
examples: In the next game, Adam and Tom will be it…

words.definition: At that time; then.
(of people)
An only child.
Later; second (of two); next, following, subsequent
examples: The after gun is abaft the forward gun.

words.definition: The person or thing in the first position.
examples: He was the first to complete the course.

words.definition: Honorific alternative letter-case form of him, sometimes used when referring to God or another important figure who is understood from context.
To or towards the inside of.
examples: Mary danced into the house.
The eagle flew off into the wide blue sky.

words.definition: Knowledge; the state of knowing.
(stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.
The digit/figure 2.
examples: The number 2202 contains three twos.

words.definition: Brand or kind; model.
examples: What make of car do you drive?

words.definition: A set of six legal balls bowled.
An act of thinking; consideration (of something).
examples: I'll have a think about that and let you know.

words.definition: To even the slightest extent, at all.
examples: I will not remain here any longer.

words.definition: Used in comparisons, to introduce the basis of comparison.
examples: she's taller than I am;  she found his advice more witty than helpful;  we have less work today than we had yesterday;  We had no choice than to return home

words.definition: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
examples: She can speak English, French, and German.   I can play football.   Can you remember your fifth birthday?
You can go outside and play when you're finished with your homework.   Can I use your pen?

words.definition: The rear of the body, especially the part between the neck and the end of the spine and opposite the chest and belly.
examples: Could you please scratch my back?
He sat in the back of the room.

words.definition: The thing, item, etc. being indicated.
examples: This isn't the item that I ordered.

words.definition: (personal) Me and at least one other person; the objective case of we.
examples: Give us a look at your paper.

words.definition: A desire, wish, longing.
For the reason (that).
examples: My life is ruined because of you!

words.definition: The act of going.
examples: It’s your go.

words.definition: In good health.
examples: I had been sick, but now I'm well.
“How are you?” — “I'm well, thank you!”

words.definition: Mentioned earlier; aforesaid.
examples: The said party has denied the charges.
